DOC.brief_summary: This prospective validation study evaluates the ability of a risk algorithm, which can simultaneously predict the risk of death at 7 days and 30 days for patients with acute heart failure presenting to the emergency department. The risk algorithms for prediction of 7-day (Emergency Heart failure Mortality Risk Grade [EHMRG]) and 30-day mortality (EHMRG30-ST) have been previously derived.
DOC.brief_title: Acute Congestive Heart Failure Urgent Care Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Patients with acute heart failure diagnosed in the emergency department Palliative or donotresuscitate (DNR) directive Dialysis dependent
